title: Facebook Discloses Flaw That Made Users' Passwords Visible to Employees
text: Mar.21 -- Facebook Inc. disclosed a flaw that made passwords of hundreds of millions of users visible to employees, but that they were never visible to anyone outside of the company. Bloomberg's Sarah Frier has more on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: Here's how to delete your Facebook account
text: Cutting ties with Facebook is harder than you think. Here's how to do it, and what's at stake.

title: Millions of Facebook, Instagram passwords exposed internally, company says
text: Facebook Inc. said in a blog post Thursday that millions of users' passwords were stored in a readable format in its internal data storage systems.

title: Facebook stored passwords in plain text, accessible by employees, report says
text: The "Squawk Alley" panel discusses the latest scandal from Facebook with Laura Martin, Needham & Co. managing director and internet & media analyst. The company allegedly kept passwords in plain text that was accessible to employees.

title: Facebook Is Dealing With Another Privacy Issue: Employees Could See Millions Of User Passwords
text: Social media giant Facebook, Inc. is making headlines for another privacy scandal, according to cybercrime investigative journalist Brian Krebs.

title: 'Facebook Coin' Could Generate Billions In Revenue: Barclays Analyst
text: Facebook Inc.'s reported stablecoin project could be a significant moneymaker for the social media giant, according to Barclays analyst Ross Sandler.

title: Facebook employees had access to millions of user passwords
text: The passwords of up to 600 million users dating back to 2012 were stored as plain text on Facebook servers.

title: Trading F.A.A.N.G.: 4 buys
text: The "Fast Money" traders give you 4 trades in the F.A.A.N.G. stocks as they all close in the green

title: Facebook explains why its A.I. didn't detect the New Zealand mosque shooting video
text: Facebook said its artificial intelligence requires a large amount of content to learn patterns that would help it detect harmful content.
